acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred, 26 November 1974, from the Virginia Treasurer's Office, Richmond, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of wills filed in Treasurer's Office Material, "J. R. and K. Company Guaranteed Bonds, Wills, and Certificates of Qualification of Holders." These wills were removed and photocopied because they were not extant elsewhere.
